title: AdTech High Temp Combo Kit Mini Hot Glue Gun with Sticks, White
description: AdTech Mini Glue Gun & Glue Sticks Combo Pack includes an AdTech High Temperature Mini Glue Gun with 7 Multi-Temp Hot Glue Sticks that bond virtually all materials and dries crystal clear. The AdTech Mini Glue Gun & Glue Sticks Combo Pack. From the Manufacturer: A US family-owned and operated company. AdTech Mini Glue Gun & Glue Sticks Combo Pack is designed for fast, strong bonds on virtually all materials, including paper, metal, plastic, wood, fabric, ceramic, etc. It includes 7 Multi-Temp Hot Glue Sticks that can be used in high, low, dual and and multi temperature glue guns. It dries crystal clear in as little as 30 seconds. The AdTech Mini Glue Gun heats up quickly and features a sturdy design with metal base stand. Convenient for on-the-go crafting. It’s the go-to all-in-one hot glue gun and glue stick set for small crafts, school, & office projects.
